page.title: 12Mrs Dickinson Hairdresser
page.content: Mrs Joan Dickinson 136,West Street ,Chantelles.She enjoys meeting people She has had 10_20 years of experiance. She said she did not like standing to long. There is 3to6 hairdryers and 7 mirrors. 2_3 people work there she gets different kind of people in.At college she did practical and theory hairdressing. They have 2to3 blodryers.She works 36_40 houres a week about 15_20 people come a day. She does perming,tinting,cutting and blodrying.It is a womens hairdressers. She gets in teenagers upwards to pentioners.
